transcripts.text: Well, I'm going to give you these.  Okay, what are these?

I'm telling you to read that, and the court order says if you do not cease and desist what you're doing, that you will be arrested for criminal contempt of court.

Back in 2015, the late great Thomas Covenant and I filed a federal civil rights lawsuit against Mark Mahan, Chief Judge of Florida's 4th Judicial Circuit headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, over his unconstitutional administrative order that banned freedom of speech and freedom of the press.
